body:
Hey guys, hope you guys enjoy this mini series, its a small map but I am uploading it with all the funny conflicts we had.
 
Chapter 1 - Porky Smells : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gv-ygyK8Uv8&feature=youtu.be
 
Chapter 2-[not made yet]
 
 
Hope you guys enjoy this one too <3
 
 
if you think I am spammy with the forums uploading  my vids tell me, and I will start uploading only avicus content here (no other single/multiplayer games on off topic) once I finish the orphanage, this and parkour school :3
Thanks

title: Minecraft | Portal 2
